name: R5-EventTiming-R4-EventTiming
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EventTiming into FHIR R4

target.display: before meal (from lat. ante cibus)
target.comment: R5 `AC` is assumed equivalent to R4 `AC` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: before lunch (from lat. ante cibus diurnus)
target.comment: R5 `ACD` is assumed equivalent to R4 `ACD` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: before breakfast (from lat. ante cibus matutinus)
target.comment: R5 `ACM` is assumed equivalent to R4 `ACM` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: before dinner (from lat. ante cibus vespertinus)
target.comment: R5 `ACV` is assumed equivalent to R4 `ACV` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Description: meal (from lat. ante cibus)
target.comment: R5 `C` is assumed equivalent to R4 `C` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Description: lunch (from lat. cibus diurnus)
target.comment: R5 `CD` is assumed equivalent to R4 `CD` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Description: breakfast (from lat. cibus matutinus)
target.comment: R5 `CM` is assumed equivalent to R4 `CM` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Description: dinner (from lat. cibus vespertinus)
target.comment: R5 `CV` is assumed equivalent to R4 `CV` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Description: Prior to beginning a regular period of extended sleep (this would exclude naps).  Note that this might occur at different times of day depending on a person's regular sleep schedule.
target.comment: R5 `HS` is assumed equivalent to R4 `HS` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: after meal (from lat. post cibus)
target.comment: R5 `PC` is assumed equivalent to R4 `PC` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: after lunch (from lat. post cibus diurnus)
target.comment: R5 `PCD` is assumed equivalent to R4 `PCD` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: after breakfast (from lat. post cibus matutinus)
target.comment: R5 `PCM` is assumed equivalent to R4 `PCM` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: after dinner (from lat. post cibus vespertinus)
target.comment: R5 `PCV` is assumed equivalent to R4 `PCV` (no map, but codes match)

target.display:
Description: Upon waking up from a regular period of sleep, in order to start regular activities (this would exclude waking up from a nap or temporarily waking up during a period of sleep)

                        
                           Usage Notes: e.g.

                        Take pulse rate on waking in management of thyrotoxicosis.

                        Take BP on waking in management of hypertension

                        Take basal body temperature on waking in establishing date of ovulation
target.comment: R5 `WAKE` is assumed equivalent to R4 `WAKE` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Event occurs during the afternoon. The exact time is unspecified and established by institution convention or patient interpretation.

target.display: Event occurs during the afternoon. The exact time is unspecified and established by institution convention or patient interpretation.
target.comment: R5 `AFT` is assumed equivalent to R4 `AFT` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Event occurs [offset] after subject goes to sleep. The exact time is unspecified and established by institution convention or patient interpretation.

target.display: Event occurs [offset] after subject goes to sleep. The exact time is unspecified and established by institution convention or patient interpretation.
target.comment: R5 `PHS` is assumed equivalent to R4 `PHS` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Event occurs a single time (with no repetitions) as soon as possible after the scheduled or actual start of the overall event.
